comments.body: Is that intended that this call does _NOT_ include `skipna`? Quick fix would be to remove the keyword arg in the `_reduce(...)` definition.

that's a 'standard' call, so its passed as an option (e.g. you can do `s.sum(skipna=False)` if you wanted to (for a regular series). We _could_ pass it to the supported reducers (e.g. min/max). 

Should we?

I think this is the same as https://github.com/pydata/pandas/issues/4147
-> If that gets fixed this part should also get fixed...

IMO it should get fixed, as I expected not to get a `inf` from `min()/max`
